title: Chocolate Cake
instructions: Preheat oven to 350째F (175째C). Grease and flour a 9-inch round cake pan.
In a large bowl, whisk together flour, sugar, cocoa, baking powder, baking soda, and salt.
In a separate bowl, combine eggs, milk, melted butter, and vanilla extract.
Pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients and mix until just combined. Do not overmix.
Pour the batter into the prepared pan and bake for 30-35 minutes, or until a wooden skewer inserted into the center comes out clean.
Let the cake cool completely before frosting.

title: Caesar Salad
instructions: Wash and chop the romaine lettuce.
In a large bowl, combine the lettuce, croutons, and Parmesan cheese.
In a small bowl, whisk together the Caesar dressing and anchovy paste (if using).
Pour the dressing over the salad and toss gently to combine.
Serve immediately.

title: Spaghetti Bolognese
instructions: Heat olive oil in a large pot over medium heat. Add ground beef and cook until browned, breaking it up with a spoon.
Add chopped onion, carrot, and celery to the pot and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
Stir in tomato paste and cook for 1 minute more.
Pour in crushed tomatoes and red wine (if using). Bring to a simmer and cook for at least 30 minutes, or longer for a richer flavor.
While the sauce is simmering, cook spaghetti according to package directions.
Drain the spaghetti and add it to the pot with the sauce. Toss to combine.
Serve hot, garnished with fresh basil and Parmesan cheese.

title: Apple Pie
instructions: Preheat oven to 375째F (190째C).
Peel, core, and slice the apples.
In a large bowl, combine apples, sugar, flour, cinnamon, and nutmeg.
Line a pie dish with pie crust.
Pour the apple mixture into the crust.
Dot with butter.
Cover with top crust or lattice.
Bake for 45-50 minutes, or until golden brown.

title: Greek Salad
instructions: Chop cucumber, tomato, and red onion.
Combine vegetables in a bowl.
Add feta cheese and olives.
Drizzle with olive oil and red wine vinegar.
Sprinkle with oregano.

title: Chicken Stir-Fry
instructions: Cut chicken into bite-sized pieces.
Stir-fry chicken in sesame oil until cooked through.
Add vegetables and stir-fry until tender-crisp.
Combine soy sauce, ginger, and garlic.
Pour sauce over stir-fry and cook until thickened.
